itunes:summary:
Mat Best, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway discuss the long awaited debut of Mat's book "Thank You For My Service" now available for presale.  Mat discusses his life and business, explaining how incredibly hard it was to get to this moment.  This is a must listen for anyone who has entertained the notion of writing a book and what the real process is really like.

description:
Mat Best, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway discuss the long awaited debut of Mat's book "Thank You For My Service" now available for presale.  Mat discusses his life and business, explaining how incredibly hard it was to get to this moment.  This is a must listen for anyone who has entertained the notion of writing a book and what the real process is really like.
